name: noncitizen
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who is not a citizen (= a member of a particular country who has certain rights): Noncitizens cannot vote in national elections. As a non-citizen, she cannot get a job without a work permit.
More examplesFewer examplesNoncitizens have the right to buy and own property.Noncitizens who are caught smuggling can be forced to leave the country.The department plans to open a new office to deal with applications from non-citizens.Most non-citizens who are sent to prison are deported after they finish their sentence.
